name: NAMELESS
description: A Psychological Top-Down Shooter with Earthbound dialogue. Utilize a mix of Action-stealth game play, turn invisible and outsmart your enemies. A shooter that doesn't just involve killing people...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8, or 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 250 MB available space
